<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lower null pointers in private and local address space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clang generates addrspacecast for null pointers in private and local</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address space, which needs to be lowered.</span></CodeLine>
